opencard.core

Interface OpenCardConstants

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicEMVAppletAccess, CardFileAppID, CardFilePartialAppID, TracerEvent

    public interface OpenCardConstants
    Common constants for all OpenCard Framework classes.
    Version:
    $Id: OpenCardConstants.java,v 1.1.1.1 1999/10/05 15:34:30 damke Exp $
    Author:
    Dirk Husemann (hud@zurich.ibm.com), Mike Wendler (mwendler@de.ibm.com)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String APPID_ENCODING
      Encoding used for application identifiers
      static java.lang.String CARD_SERVICE_CACHEPATH
      for future usecard service download: path where downloaded archives are cached
      static java.lang.String CARD_SERVICE_CACHETIME
      for future usecard service download: seconds downloaded archives are cached
      static java.lang.String CARD_SERVICE_CHECK
      for future usecard service download: check signature of downloaded service archive
      static java.lang.String CARD_SERVICE_LISTER_CLASS
      for future use: card service download : class implementing service list
      static java.lang.String CARD_SERVICE_REGISTRY_TAG
      card service registry tag.
      static java.lang.String CARD_SERVICE_URL
      for future use: card service download URL
      static java.lang.String CARD_TERMINAL_REGISTRY_TAG
      card terminal registry tag.
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_OPENCARD_LOADER_CLASSNAME
      class name of the default property loader class.
      static java.lang.String OPENCARD_DOTPROPERTIES
      alternative properties file default name
      static java.lang.String OPENCARD_PROPERTIES
      properties file default name
      static java.lang.String OPENCARD_PROPERTY
      Prefix for accessing system properties.
      static int SMARTCARD_REMOVED
      SmartCard events 0x002.
